segments.text: I notice the woman is so absorbed in her task, completely missing the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, taking cookies while she’s not looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, and it looks like it’s about to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the whole kitchen is going to be ruined if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading everywhere, and the woman is still drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm outside and the mess inside is almost too much.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless everyone is being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
